featured.text: Receptionist: I’m (18) terribly sorry, Mr. Hagen.

definition.zh_def: 哈根（Hagen）是一個德國姓氏，常見於德國及其他德語國家，也可能指代某些地名或品牌。
definition.en_def: Hagen is a German surname commonly found in Germany and other German-speaking countries, and may also refer to certain places or brands.
definition.example: Hagen is known for its beautiful parks and vibrant culture.
